page.title: 11Leisure Activities
page.content: In Cookridge there are activities like horse riding at Ling Bob Farm and walking in the nearby countryside where it is peaceful, quiet and a pleasant change from the noisy city. At Cookridge Village Hall there are ballet, tap and modern dancing lessons, slimnastics and a drama club which puts on pantomimes and plays. In the summer holidays there is a children's play scheme. At the churches there are cub and brownie packs where you can work for many badges. There are play groups, youth clubs and over sixties clubs. After work some people like growing fresh vegetables and flowers. They say it is very satisfying to have a neat and tidy garden. We found that some people like making models and decorating. One dad had even made a boat in which he can go sailing.
